message: For what it's worth, for the sake of geekiness...
name: What's new after 20 years?
caption: www.codeproject.com
description:
I've been away from the business about 20 years now. I studied CS in the early 90's when C++ was the upcoming star, to find out that it is old hat now-a-days.
 
I've been side-tracked by accounting and it would be interesting to find out your take as to what an Old Fart like me should update my skil...
